name: upset-dev
title: Upset.dev
description: A collection of utilities from upset.dev that you can interact inside Raycast!
author: sereinne

commands.name: favicone
commands.title: Favicone
commands.subtitle: upset.dev
commands.description: Fetches favicones from websites and customize it with your needs

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
